acts.title:
Given I go to Handow_Homepage 
(http://www.handow.org/lab)

facts.title:
Then I can see Lab_Version_Button 
(#button-lab-version)
is displayed
facts._title: I can see it {selector} is displayed

facts.title:
And I can see Lab_Preset_Button 
(#button-add-jack)
is displayed
facts._title: I can see it {selector} is displayed

acts.title:
When I click Lab_Version_Button 
(#button-lab-version)

And I wait Spin 
(#ajax-loading-spin)
is disappeared

facts.title:
Then I can see Lab_Version_Showing 
(message@h4w('v0.3.2@2020-02-07 01:11:24'))
is displayed
facts._title: I can see it {xpath} is displayed

whens.scenario: Click button to add Jack Smth(phase-2)

parameters.Lab_User_Added: message@h4w('New user (Jack Smith) has been added')

acts.title:
When I click Lab_Preset_Button 
(#button-add-jack)

And I set Test_Cookies 
([object Object])
to current browser instance

acts.title:

(#ajax-loading-spin)
is disappeared

facts.title:

is displayed

available in current page

whens.scenario: Navigate to Table and varify users amount and specific username(phase-1)

acts.title:
When I click Table_Demo_Link 
(#lab-demo-1)

And I wait A_Moment 
(1)
seconds

facts.title:
Then I can see User_Table 
(#demo-table)
is displayed
facts._title: I can see it {selector} is displayed

facts.title:
And I can see All_Users 
(username@h4w)
amount User_Quantity 
(7)
facts._title: I can see them {xpath} amount number {number}

facts.title:
And I can see Mark_Galeet 
(username@h4w('Mark Galeet'))
is displayed
facts._title: I can see it {xpath} is displayed

acts.title:
When I click Table_Head_Level 
(#table-head-level)

facts.title:
Then I can see Level_Items 
(level@h4w)
sorted by ASC_Order 
(asc)
facts._title: I can see them {xpath} sorted by order {order}

acts.title:
When I click Table_Head_Username 
(#table-head-username)

facts.title:
Then I can see Username_Items 
(username@h4w)
sorted by ASC_Order 
(asc)
facts._title: I can see them {xpath} sorted by order {order}
